name: D.I. Sagree
description:
Act I: Wake Up Call

Join D.I. Sagree as his partner in this Film Noir -style narrative adventure game!

Made in one month for Quick Play 2022 Game Jam. Due to jam's rules, there's only an Android build available.

The theme for the jam was "Tradition". We incorporated this theme in two ways:

1. We used the traditions of Film Noir, with a heavy-drinking, hard-boiled detective as the protagonist, and a femme fatale, and of course the visual style and music.

2. We explore the tradition of player-character interactions, where usually the protagonist of a game follows the players commands without question. Sagree is strong-willed, and often outright refuses to do what the player wants. Player will have to coax, pressure, force or manipulate him.

Made by two Finnish developers:

Jorava - Game Design, Story, Code, Sound Design, Music (Piano Improvisation)
JapeNess - 3D-Modelling, Rigging, Animations, Lighting, Music (Arrangement and Production)
